main.name: Shalin Patel
main.description: Enthusiastic Computer Science student with lots of passion and experience in the Software Engineering realm. Excellent programming skills in multiple languages and a strong background in how to work as a team with admirable communication skills.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Software Engineer - Backend
work.description1: • Developed the schedule a bind feature by writing endpoints in Python and Temporal workflows in Go, scheduling over 220 quotes to be bound resulting in a 15% reduction in the bind system's p95 latency.
work.description2: • Led the renewals Canadian expansion implementing gRPC endpoints in Go and workflows in Temporal to ensure compliance with regional regulations, resulting in $2.9mm gross written premium.

work.title: Software Engineer - Control Plane
work.description1: • Launched trial-based on-boarding to serve 110 new clients by building new Go endpoints, modifying relevant front-end components in React, and integrating with Datadog to track incoming requests.
work.description2: • Refactored the billing architecture using Airflow and Azure Blob Storage to introduce fault tolerance, data reconciliation, and retryable DAGs reducing invoice generation errors by 20%.
work.description3: • Worked with Microsoft to integrate Astronomer as an Azure Native ISV service within the Azure Marketplace, involving the development of custom endpoints in Go and a custom usage-based billing workflow, generating $230k in top-line revenue.

work.company: AWS - Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow
work.title: Software Development Engineering Intern
work.description1: • Implemented a log parser in CloudWatch reducing customer tickets by 10%, targeting failed tasks in Airflow.
work.description2: • Designed a system to ingest data across MWAA Environments into a Data Warehouse using AWS Redshift.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description1: • Wrote ETL pipelines in Python and deployed using Nomad to support 13+ quantitative trading strategies.
work.description2: • Designed an asynchronous search platform to support regex searching of 100k+ documents.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description1: • Led the development of a flagship Android application with 1M+ downloads and 41k monthly active users.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description1: • Customized dashboards in Sisense to track retention rate and crash rate for 7 screens, which were reviewed at weekly operations meetings and led to the discovery of 8 actionable tickets.
work.description2: • Developed maintenance window feature on Android application using Java and Kotlin, collaborating with a cross-functional team comprised of designers, product managers, and engineers.

work.title: Software Development Intern
work.description1: • Implemented a route optimization algorithm in C++ similar to the Travelling Salesman Problem, achieving O(nlog(n)) runtime for the average client use case.
work.description2: • Created a full-stack proof-of-concept using React Native, Apollo GraphQL, and Golang that successfully led to full development.
work.description3: • Contributed to client front-end dashboard using React, Mapbox and tested using Jest.
work.description4: • Developed critical in-production admin dashboard using React, Node, Express, and MongoDB.

work.title: Infrastructure Technologies Services Co-op
work.description1: • Worked with IBM's Privileged Identity Manager to handle access management for the secure data servers at the Data Center Operations sector in MGCS.
work.description2: • Optimized SQL queries in SSMS sent through PowerBI reports improving time taken by 54%.

project.title: Python | text2emotion | SpotifyAPI | TwitterAPI
project.description1: • A python bot which tweets a generated spotify playlist based on the emotions captured from a tagged tweet using text2emotion.
project.description2: • Won Best Machine Learning Hack at Hacklytics 2021.

project.title: Python | Pandas | MatPlotLib | Scikit-Learn
project.description1: • Program that successfully predicts power generation and irradiation of solar panels with an 88% accuracy.
project.description2: • Cleaned data using pandas, detecting for missing values and replacing them with their respective means.
project.description3: • Performed EDA using MatPlotLib to graph the data, identify trends and form initial hypotheses.
project.description4: • Implemented DecisionTree and XGBoost Regressor models using Scikit-Learn to validate hypotheses.

project.title: MongoDB | Express.js | React.js | Node.js | JavaScript | HTML5 | CSS3
project.description1: • A full stack MERN web application with a Material UI appearance.
project.description2: • It allows the user to register/login and store their multiple online credentials and safely logout.
project.description3: • Incorporated CRUD functionality, the use of React hooks, context and JWT authentication.

project.title: Django | Python | JavaScript | HTML5 | CSS3
project.description1: • Innovated a Facebook-type application directed towards youth with a space-theme.
project.description2: • Focused on making an elegant, user-friendly interface by using Django for CRUD functionality.
project.description3: • Uploaded on pythonanywhere.com, capturing a web traffic of 674 within the first two months.
